full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS MA DBYANGS CAN MA'I GDAMS PA DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN BSNYEMS PA'I RDO RJE,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS MA DBYANGS CAN MA'I GDAMS PA DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYI LEGS BSHAD YOD BZHIN, ,RANG CAG THA MA LA BAS NGAL BA BYAS PA'I YIG TSOGS LA 'OS PA MED KYANG, DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I LUGS 'DZIN PA'I MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI GTZUG GI COD PAn, PAndI TA BO DONG BA 'JIGS MED GRAGS PA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL LAM MTSAN GZHAN DBYANGS CAN DGA' BAR GRAGS PA GANG DE NYID LAS, ,SLOB MA RNAMS RIM GYIS BRGYUD PA'I YIG CHA 'GA' ZHIG 'DUG KYANG, MCHOD CHOG MED CING LAS TSOGS SKOR CUNG ZAD MA TSANG BA DANG, JO NANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RJE BTZUN T'A RA N'A THA 'AM, ,MTSAN GZHAN SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA'I LO TZTSA BA KUN DGA' SNYING POS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS RJES GNANG SOGS YOD KYANG, LAS TSOGS @042B SKOR GZHAN LA KHA 'PHANGS PA'I STABS KYIS MA TSANG BA DANG, ZHVA SER COD PAn 'DZIN PA'I MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO RJE 'BYAMS DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG LAS TSOGS ZHIG 'DUG KYANG, ,MCHOD CHOG DANG SBYIN SREG SOGS MA TSANG BAS, ,CHA TSANG BA ZHIG BRIS 'DUN YOD PA'I STENG, ,MTSO BDUN JA SAG GI THER GUN BLA MA KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG BSTAN PA SPEL BYED PI LIG THU NO MON HAN RIN PO CHE'I SKU MDUN PA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NOR BU DANG, DRUG YIG PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS, ,GZHAN YANG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SOGS DON GNYER CAN RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU CHA TSANG BA ZHIG DOGS TSUL BYUNG BA'I GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYIS LEGS BSHAD RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS SHIG, DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA GNYIS KYI GSUNG RGYUN GYIS BRGYAN TE DBYANGS CAN BSNYEMS PA'I RDO RJES BRIS PA'O, ,DZA YANTU, ,)
